```{r,echo=FALSE}
n = sample(12:100,1)

ach = 1:100

sol = paste0(1*((n%%ach)==0),collapse="")

al = paste0("* ",ach,collapse="\n")
```


Question
========

Select all positive [factors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Divisor) of `r n`.


Answerlist
--------

`r al`


Solution
========

The factors of `r n` are shown here:

`r ach[(n%%ach)==0]`


Meta-information
============
extype: mchoice
exsolution: `r sol`
exname: factor_quadratic
